Headline: නවසීලන්ත වෙඩි තැබීම ගැන ලංකාවේ කනගාටුව
News Content: නවසීලන්තයේ ක්‍රයිස්චර්ච් නුවර මුස්ලිම් පල්ලියක සිදුවූ වූ විවෘත වෙඩි තැබීම පිළිබඳව ශ්‍රී ලංකාවද සිය කනගාටුව ප්‍රකාශ කර තිබේ. අගමැති රනිල් වික්‍රමසිංහ, විපක්ෂනායක මහින්ද රාජපක්ෂ ඇතුළු පිරිසක් මෙසේ නවසීලන්තය වෙනුවෙන් සිය කනගාටුව ප්‍රකාශ කර තිබේ.   In the wake of the heinous attacks in Christchurch, I offer my condolences and support to New Zealand. It is a country with a strong history of peace, multiculturalism, and tolerance, and I have no doubt that its people will not allow this incident to undermine those values. I was deeply saddened to hear the news of the unprecedented violent attacks on mosques in #christchurch #NewZealand. I would like to express my condolences to the families that lost loved ones. Our thoughts and prayers are with the people of New Zealand. I was deeply saddened to hear the news of the unprecedented violent attacks on mosques in #christchurch #NewZealand. I would like to express my condolences to the families that lost loved ones. Our thoughts and prayers are with the people of New Zealand. Devastated by the reports coming from New Zealand, My heartfelt condolence goes to the families of those affected, relieved to hear that @BCBtigers cricketers are safe
